com.mopub.common

Class MoPubLifecycleManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mopub.common.MoPubLifecycleManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LifecycleListener

    public class MoPubLifecycleManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements LifecycleListener
    This class handles delegating lifecycle callback events to ads SDKs that require them.

      • addLifecycleListener

        public void addLifecycleListener(LifecycleListener listener)
        Adds a lifecycle listener to the manager. The manager takes ownership with a strong reference.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to add to the lifecycle manager.
